messages.content: My coffee machine arrived broken and I can’t get anyone on the phone.

Hi [Customer], I’m really sorry your coffee machine arrived damaged — that’s not the experience we want for you. I’ve arranged a replacement shipment and you’ll receive tracking details within 24 hours. Thanks for your patience while we make this right.
I was charged twice for the same order.

Hi [Customer], thank you for flagging this. I can see the duplicate charge — we’ve already processed a refund for the extra payment, which should appear in your account within 3–5 business days. I truly apologize for the inconvenience.
My package shows delivered but I never received it.

Hi [Customer], I completely understand how frustrating that must be. I’ve reached out to our delivery partner to investigate the issue and arranged for a replacement if it can’t be located. You’ll get an update within 12 hours — thank you for your patience.
The earbuds I bought stopped working after a week.

Hey [Customer], I’m so sorry to hear your earbuds stopped working — that’s definitely not expected. I’ve initiated a replacement order under warranty, and you’ll get a confirmation email shortly. We’ll ensure you’re fully satisfied with your new pair.
I want to cancel my subscription immediately.

Hi [Customer], I can help with that right away. I’ve canceled your subscription as requested, and you won’t be billed further. You’ll still have access to premium features until your current cycle ends. We hope to serve you again in the future.
I returned my jacket two weeks ago but haven’t received a refund yet.

Hi [Customer], thanks for checking in. I’ve looked into your return — the jacket arrived at our warehouse yesterday, and the refund has now been processed. Expect the amount to reflect in your account within 3 business days. Sorry for the delay!
The promo code you sent me isn’t working at checkout.

Hi [Customer], I’m sorry for the trouble with your promo code! I’ve just reissued a new one that’s valid for the same discount — please try using code NEW20 at checkout. If you still face issues, I’ll manually apply the discount for you.
I ordered the wrong color shoes by mistake. Can I change it?

Hi [Customer], absolutely — I’ve updated your order to the color you requested. You’ll receive a confirmation email shortly. If you ever need adjustments before shipping, just message us and we’ll take care of it!
My order is delayed and the tracking hasn’t updated in a week.

Hi [Customer], I completely understand the concern. I checked with the courier — your order is still in transit and expected to arrive in the next two days. I’ll personally monitor this and send you a tracking update as soon as it moves again.
I received the wrong item in my order — I got a size medium instead of small.

Hi [Customer], oh no! I’m really sorry for the mix-up. I’ve created a replacement order for the correct size and included a prepaid return label for the incorrect item. You’ll receive shipping details shortly — thank you for your understanding!
